entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sydenham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
